posting_body: ['Reserve at Gardenlake', '1000 Lake Ridge Parkway, Riverdale, GA, 30296', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 107', 'OR Text', '107', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'Interested in more information?', 'Visit link below:', '<URL>', 'WELCOME HOME!', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 685 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Our doors are open for self-guided, in-person, and virtual tours!', 'As we value your safety, our community has implemented practices due to COVID-19.', 'To continue protecting the safety of our customers and our team, masks are required!', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Type: Cat, Dog', 'Max Weight of Pets: 50', 'Max Number of Pets: 2', 'Pet Policy: We welcome up to 2 pets per apartment home.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Weight limit is 50lbs.', 'We accept cats and dogs.', 'Please call our leasing office for complete pet policy.', 'Income Requirements:', 'Combined gross income for all applicants much equal or exceed three times the rental rate.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'mXz0xoFoK']
